amendment.description: To sunset the H-2C visa program after the date that is 5 years after the date of enactment of this Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4095 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 150.

action.text: Amendment SA 4095 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S5100-5104, S5105; text: CR S5100) To sunset the H-2C visa program after the date that is 5 years after the date of enactment of this Act.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4095 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 150.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4095 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 150.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4095 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
